#summary All about how to search/query your tables.

All about how to search/query your tables.

Lets assume we have following `User` domain class:
{{{
<?php
class User extends Sphorm {
	// mapping
	static $mapping = array(
		'table' => 'users',
		'id' => array(
			'column'=> 'UserID',
			'generator' => 'auto'
		),
		columns => array(
			'name' => 'UserName',
			'age' => 'UserAge'
		)
	);
	
	public function __construct(array $init = array()) {
		parent::__construct($init);
	}
}
}}}

Get all users (when we say all this means ALL of them):
{{{
$users = User()->all();
}}}

Get all users customized:
{{{
//max 10
$users = User()->all(array('max' => 10));


}}}
